title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing 'Finish' in the JAR packager, the following error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
OB: This error message is displayed after pressing 'Finish' in the JAR packager.
EB: To resolve this issue, I suggest implementing a functionality that allows users to save their work before creating a JAR file. Currently, users have to quit the wizard, save their work, open the wizard again, and re-enter all the fields. Alternatively, a dialog could be displayed to prompt users to save their work before creating the JAR file.
SR: The suggested solution can be implemented by adding a save functionality in the JAR packager wizard and displaying a dialog to prompt users to save their work before proceeding with the JAR creation process.
